text: Paraitraka aparaitrara paraa prthaka nakaraa laike tomaloke yi arasthata acha allahe muminasakalaka se'i arasthata erai nidiye. E'idarae gayeba (adrsya) samparke tomalokaka arahita karaa allahara niyama nahaya; kintu allahe te'omra raachulasakalara majara paraa yaka iccha manonita karae. Gatike tomaloke allaha arau te'omra raachulasakalara oparata imana ana. Yadi tomaloke imana ana arau takbaraa aralambana karaa tente tomalokara babe ache maha puraskara
